metadata.title: CVE-2023-28879 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Artifex Ghostscript through 10.01.0, there is a buffer overflow leadingto potential corruption of data internal to the PostScript interpreter, inbase/sbcp.c. This affects BCPEncode, BCPDecode, TBCPEncode, and TBCPDecode.If the write buffer is filled to one byte less than full, and one thentries to write an escaped character, two bytes are written.

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
